product_name: Hiking Trails of the Cohutta and Big Frog Wilderness - 2nd Edition
long_description: Explore one of the most scenic and unspoiled areas of the Southern Appalachians. Author: Tim Homan. Softcover; 238 pages; black-and-white illustrations, photographs and maps. Peachtree Publishers; copyright 2007. Includes 24 wilderness trails in north-central Georgia and southeastern Tennessee. Detailed write-ups and precise directions to access points for each trail. Easy-to-use information headers, including length, difficulty rating and scenic features. Five trailhead area maps and two regional maps. Descriptions of the area's diverse flora and fauna with botanical drawings.
short_description: Explore one of the most scenic and unspoiled areas of the Southern Appalachians.
